ComicInfo.Title: The Temple at the End of Time!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Earth is destroyed at the hand of the Time Twisters, but will time trave be the key to giving Earth its future back?
With the Time-Twisters gone and 50th century Earth in ruins, Thor, Jane Foster and the Warriors Three find themselves the only survivors of planetary holocaust. Zarrko and the Servitor reemerge from the Time Cube, blaming the Asgardians for their failure.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 10:54:26. [CVDB16183] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:39:00. [Issue ID 29667]
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,First Citizen Derek,Jane Foster,Warriors Three [Fandral,Servitor,Hogun,He Who Remains,Volstagg],The Protectroids,Zarrko, the Tomorrow Man
